Merge pull request #49 from petr-muller/fixlets

Fix error messages on client creation failures

Use a job for idle cleanup so that pod eviction doesn't orphan namespaces

Pods can be evicted, which prevents them from running to completion. cleanup-when-idle depends on getting a chance to handle termination, but eviction will bypass that. Therefore we use a job instead of a single pod, and the job can retry up to 6 times (the default) if evicted.
Fix error messages on client creation failures

Pods can be evicted, which prevents them from running to completion. cleanup-when-idle depends on getting a chance to handle termination, but eviction will bypass that. Therefore we use a job instead of a single pod, and the job can retry up to 6 times (the default) if evicted.

Merge pull request #49 from petr-muller/fixlets

Fix error messages on client creation failures

Use a job for idle cleanup so that pod eviction doesn't orphan namespaces

Pods can be evicted, which prevents them from running to completion. cleanup-when-idle depends on getting a chance to handle termination, but eviction will bypass that. Therefore we use a job instead of a single pod, and the job can retry up to 6 times (the default) if evicted.

Merge pull request #58 from smarterclayton/prevent_eviction_blockers

Use a job for idle cleanup so that pod eviction doesn't orphan namespaces

Don't tear down namespace when interrupted

Instead, we rely on the job to ensure we eventually detect idle. Means
we can safely be killed.

react to see why the issue occurred. It may slightly increase resource
use.

Merge pull request #60 from smarterclayton/default_length

When importing images from the same cluster, use refs

As image stream sizes get larger, it can take longer to import. When we
are importing from the same cluster use image stream image references

Merge pull request #61 from smarterclayton/input_norm

When importing images from the same cluster, use refs

Perform an additional check to see if src and dst are the same

When running inside a cluster, the dst client hostname will be the kubernetes service IP, but the src client hostname might be the external URL to the cluster. Perform a check on the input by seeing if is reachable by the dst client and the target has the same UID.

Allows us to bypass image stream import for most clusters.

Updates test/e2e_node/device_plugin.go to cope with recent device
manager change in commit 7b1ae66.
Also changes the test to make sure node is indeed ready after Kubelet
restart. The previous readiness check may use old API state but
didn't run into the issue due to the delay of waiting for pod restart.

Updates test/e2e_node/device_plugin.go to cope with recent device
manager change in commit 7b1ae66.
Also changes the test to make sure node is indeed ready after Kubelet
restart. The previous readiness check may use old API state but
didn't run into the issue due to the delay of waiting for pod restart.

Updates test/e2e_node/device_plugin.go to cope with recent device
manager change in commit 7b1ae66.
Also changes the test to make sure node is indeed ready after Kubelet
restart. The previous readiness check may use old API state but
didn't run into the issue due to the delay of waiting for pod restart.
Removes support of internal types from logsForObject

Updates test/e2e_node/device_plugin.go to cope with recent device
manager change in commit 7b1ae66.
Also changes the test to make sure node is indeed ready after Kubelet
restart. The previous readiness check may use old API state but
didn't run into the issue due to the delay of waiting for pod restart.
Removes support of internal types from logsForObject
use podPrefix as it's defined
admission/exec: externalize exec admission controller
